com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface SSHConnectionService2

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface SSHConnectionService2
extends Service

Provides access to remote systems.

Note that establishing a connection to a remote system in this way is not the same as logging in using an interactive terminal. Establishing a connection just creates a secure link to the remote system, it does not run any login scripts or other processing.

Since:
5.5.5.5

Method Detail

addConnectionTest2

void addConnectionTest2(java.lang.String scheme,
                        ConnectionTestCallback<SSHConnection2> callback)
Allow Agents agents to register themselves for testing credentials provided by FglAM. This is for testing specific functionality available to the agent when connected using this credential, for example reading files that are not world readable.

When such a request is made, FglAM will open a test connection and pass it to the agent using the callback interface registered here. Once the agent has completed the test and returned FglAM will close the connection.

Parameters:
scheme - The URI scheme to be associated with this validator. See URI.getScheme() for value specifications.
callback - The callback used to test connections that have been established

establish

SSHConnection2 establish(java.lang.String host,
                         int port,
                         CredentialQuery2 query,
                         long timeoutMillis,
                         java.lang.String... tags)
                         throws ConnectionCancelledException,
                                RemoteConnectionException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
Called by agent code to establish a connection. The provided query will be used to find credentials for the agent when establishing the connection.

Parameters:
host - The host to connect to
port - The port to connect on (22 is the standard SSH port)
query - Query used to find connection credentials
timeoutMillis - The number of milliseconds to wait for the connection to establish before failing
tags - Optional string tags to associate with credential events generated by this login attempt
Returns:
The established connection
Throws:
ConnectionCancelledException - The connection attempt was purposely cancelled
RemoteConnectionException - A connection could not be established
java.lang.InterruptedException - This thread was interrupted before the connection was established
java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - The connection was not established within timeoutMillis ms.

establish

SSHConnection2 establish(java.lang.String host,
                         int port,
                         java.lang.String purpose,
                         long timeoutMillis,
                         java.lang.String... tags)
                         throws ConnectionCancelledException,
                                RemoteConnectionException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
Called by agent code to establish a connection to a particular host/port. The SSHConnectionService will query the FMS for any configured credentials that can be used and try to connect. Once the connection has been established it will be returned to the agent to use. The agent is responsible for closing the connection once it is no longer needed.

This method will search for any credentials that are defined for this host/port combination. If finer grained control is required of which credentials are required the agent should defined a specialized CredentialQuery2 and call establish(String, int, CredentialQuery2, long, String...) instead.

Parameters:
host - The host to connect to
port - The port to connect on (22 is the standard SSH port)
purpose - The named purpose value for establishing a connection. This value is unique to your agent implementation
timeoutMillis - The number of milliseconds to wait for the connection to establish before failing
tags - Optional string tags to associate with credential events generated by this login attempt
Returns:
The established connection
Throws:
ConnectionCancelledException - The connection attempt was purposely cancelled
RemoteConnectionException - A connection could not be established
java.lang.InterruptedException - This thread was interrupted before the connection was established
java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - The connection was not established within timeoutMillis ms.

release

void release(SSHConnection2 connection)
Releases a connection. It is safe to pass null in here.

Parameters:
connection - The connection to release
